babel Royal wedding

babel Royal wedding

Celebrate your love and say "I do" in the grandest fashion, in the grandest city in the world, New York City.

OFFER DEtails

offer includes

  • One night stay in the Royal Suite

  • Seating for up to 30 guests

  • Flower arrangements & piano player

  • A selection of canapes from our Executive Chef & a champagne toast for up to 30 guests

  • Afternoon Tea in The Palm Court served after your ceremony

  • Rose petals, a bubble bath, and champagne served in suite that evening

  • Mementos of your Plaza wedding including two monogrammed robes, two Plazachampagne flutes, and The Plaza’s signature scent

Availability

This offer is available all year round, subject to availability.

Rates

Rates starting at $30.000

Book package

To make your reservation, please email our Event Services Manager at babel@gmail.com

Terms & Conditions

New bookings only. Blackout dates may apply. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer or promotion. House cancellation policy applies.
